columns.name: REPORT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: GC3 Global indetifier for the entity. Is created by concatenating Domain Name,'.' and XID.

columns.name: REPORT_GROUP_XID
columns.description: GC3 Unique indetifier for the entity. Is used for creating the GID

columns.name: REPORT_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the report group.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Domain of the User. Is used for creating the GID.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the id of the user who first entered the record.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the date and time when the record was first entered in the database.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the id of the user who last updated the record.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: For audit trail purposes. This field stores the date and time when the record was updated in the database.
